Class CheckerBoard

java.lang.Object
cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models.AbsCheckerBoard
cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models.CheckerBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICheckerBoard
public class CheckerBoard extends AbsCheckerBoard
CheckerBoard class that implements ICheckerBoard. Implements a checkerboard using a 2D array of characters to serve as the checkerboard
